name: Free Talk Studio: Mari no Kimamana Oshaberi
overview: In Free Talk Studio: Mari no Kimamana Oshaberi the player takes the role of a young female Radio DJ that have to choose different people to make interviews, During each interview the player have to choose between the questions to make more interesting the interview. Some questions will be more interesting than others and make the audience grow and others will make the invited happier or even angrier. During each interview other events will happen like the commercial time and some actions that the invited to the radio program will do depending of the questions that the player make.
